mapper.select: SELECT i.path from role_menu rm, menu_interface mi, interface i where rm.role_id = #{roleId} and rm.menu_id = mi.menu_id and i.id = mi.interface_id

SELECT r.id, r.name, r.restaurant_id as restaurantId FROM role r WHERE restaurant_id = #{restaurantId} and r.id > 0
and r.name like concat('%',#{key},'%')
order by
r.${page.sortName} ${page.sortOrder},
r.id desc LIMIT #{page.start} , #{page.pageSize}

SELECT count(r.id) FROM role r WHERE r.id > 0 and restaurant_id = #{restaurantId}
and r.name like concat('%',#{key},'%')
SELECT count(r.id) FROM role r WHERE restaurant_id = #{restaurantId} and id = #{roleId}
SELECT rm.menu_id FROM role_menu rm WHERE rm.role_id = #{roleId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO role (NAME, restaurant_id) SELECT #{name}, #{restaurantId} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT NAME, restaurant_id FROM role WHERE NAME = #{name} and restaurant_id = #{restaurantId})
